segments.text: This is infuriating—how can she not see the sink overflowing like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, damaging the cabinets, and she's just polishing that stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, and the floor's a slippery mess waiting for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing on that rickety stool—complete recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's about to tip over, and no one's stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies behind her back, breaking every rule.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl egging him on makes it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes stacked up, ready to crash if something falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside mocks this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets and tied-back curtains—nothing's secure here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this negligence unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should yell and fix this chaos right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's maddening how unaware they all seem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene screams poor parenting and carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
